DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize Asian Americans compare Caucasians , high risk develop pro-inflammatory state may contribute development heart disease diabetes change traditional Asian diet typical Western diet . These inflammatory response reflect activation monocyte measure protein kinase C ( PKC ) , know activator monocyte . We also hypothesize change inflammatory response gingival crevicular fluid ( GCF ) reflect similar change marker plasma monocyte . Specific aim : 1 . To compare inflammatory response ( primarily PKC activation monocyte ) , Far-East Asian Americans Caucasian Americans , change traditional Asian diet typical American diet . 2 . To correlate biochemical change inflammatory response plasma monocyte gingival crevicular fluid ( GCF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Inflammatory State Asian Americans Changing From Traditional Asian Diets American Diet - Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Caucasian FarEast Asian decent 2 . Ages 25 55 year old 3 . Has family history diabetes define first degree relative diagnose diabetes mellitus , and/or medical history gestational diabetes ( GDM ) , impaired fasting glucose ( IFG ) impair glucose tolerance ( IGT ) 4 . BMI 18.5 25.0 kg/m2 5 . Agree maintain constant physical activity level duration study 6 . Agree utilize contraception duration study ( female subject ) 7 . Have minimum 12 natural teeth 8 . Scoring 2 dental screening questionnaire ( See appendix ) 9 . Ability communicate English 1 . Acute weight loss/weight gain past 6 month ( define +4 lbs more/month ) 2 . History diabetes 3 . Current Smokers ( include quit < 1 year ) 4 . Heavy alcohol drinker , define drink 7 drinks/week . Those drink alcohol need report document . They ask maintain level alcohol consumption throughout study . 5 . Medical history vascular disease ( CAD , MI , stroke , CABG , angioplasty ) , diabetes , liver disease , kidney disease , cancer , AIDS , bleed disorder 6 . History food allergy food product diet menu . 7 . Enrolled another investigational study within 1 month prior screen study 8 . Vegetarian , significant food aversion , anyone comply diet 9 . Pregnancy breast feed 10 . Other autoimmune inflammatory condition disease may compromise patient 's safety compliance study individual basis 11 . Chronic use antibiotic antiinflammatory medication ( > 1 month ) within past year 12 . On medication statin , angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor , warfarin , aspirin antiinflammatory medication . Daily multivitamin permit , exclude pharmacological dos anti oxidant allow . 13 . Individuals dental need require extensive dental restoration cavity , root canal , crown , etc .
